title: The Gift of Fury
description: Over the years, magic has grown weaker as mankind has made more and more technological advances. Many things that were possible in the past are no longer possible or easier to accomplish using technology. One man seeks to change all of that. He plans to bring back the golden age of magic. To do so means sacrificing the technology that mankind depends upon and unleashing horrors best left forgotten. Count isn’t about to let that happen. Even with the help of his friends, it’s a fight he isn’t sure he can win.
author: Richard  Jackson
